com.castlabs.android.player

Class PlaybackState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.castlabs.android.player.PlaybackState

  • public class PlaybackState
extends java.lang.Object
    This object wraps the information about playback state and contains all the mandatory parameters that are required to start playback for a given URL.
    Since:
    2.0.0

      • PlaybackState

        public PlaybackState(@NonNull
                     java.lang.String path,
                     long positionUs,
                     int audioTrackGroupIndex,

                     int subtitlesTrackIndex,
                     boolean playing,

                     DrmConfiguration drmConfiguration)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException
        Create a new instance where the format will be auto-detected.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the content
        positionUs - the current playback position in microseconds
        audioTrackGroupIndex - the current audio track group index
        audioTrackIndex - the current audio track index
        subtitlesTrackGroupIndex - the current subtitle track group index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        subtitlesTrackIndex - the current subtitle track index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        playing - current playing state
        drmConfiguration - the drm configuration
        Throws:

      • PlaybackState

        public PlaybackState(@NonNull
                     java.lang.String path,
                     long positionUs,
                     int audioTrackGroupIndex,
                     int audioTrackIndex,
                     int subtitlesTrackGroupIndex,
                     int subtitlesTrackIndex,
                     boolean playing,
                     @Nullable
                     DrmConfiguration drmConfiguration,
                     int format,
                     float volume,
                     int videoTrackGroupIndex,
                     AbrConfiguration abrConfiguration,
                     boolean mergeVideoTracks,
                     int videoCodecFilter,
                     android.graphics.Point videoSizeFilter,
                     int analyticsSessionType)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.lang.NullPointerException
        Create a new instance
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the content
        positionUs - the current playback position in microseconds
        audioTrackGroupIndex - the current audio track group index
        audioTrackIndex - the current audio track index
        subtitlesTrackGroupIndex - the current subtitle track group index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        subtitlesTrackIndex - the current subtitle track index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        playing - current playing state
        drmConfiguration - the drm configuration
        format - the playback format, one of SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_DASH, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_HLS, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_SMOOTHSTREAMING, or SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_MP4 where SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN will cause auto-detection to try to guess the format from the given URL
        volume - the audio track volume as 0 <= volume <= 1
        videoTrackGroupIndex - the current video track group index
        abrConfiguration - The ABR configuration
        videoCodecFilter - The video codec filter, one of SdkConsts.VideoCodecFilter
        videoSizeFilter - The video size filter
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the path is empty or the format was null and no content format could be deduced from the URL
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null

        path - the path to the content
        positionUs - the current playback position in microseconds
        audioTrackGroupIndex - the current audio track group index
        audioTrackIndex - the current audio track index
        subtitlesTrackGroupIndex - the current subtitle track group index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        subtitlesTrackIndex - the current subtitle track index or -1 if subtitles are disabled
        playing - current playing state
        drmConfiguration - the drm configuration
        format - the playback format, one of SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_DASH, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_HLS, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_SMOOTHSTREAMING, or SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_MP4 where SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN will cause auto-detection to try to guess the format from the given URL
        volume - the audio track volume as 0 <= volume <= 1
        videoTrackGroupIndex - the current video track group index
        abrConfiguration - The ABR configuration
        videoCodecFilter - The video codec filter, one of SdkConsts.VideoCodecFilter
        videoSizeFilter - The video size filter
        preferredAudioLanguage - The preferred audio language
        preferredTextLanguage - The preferred text language
        downloadFolder - The folder where offline content is located
        enableTunneling - Enable support for tunneling on API >= 21
        analyticsSessionType - Analytics session type
        bufferConfiguration - The buffer configuration
        userID - The User ID
        liveConfiguration - The live configuration
        networkConfiguration - The network config
        adRequest - The ads request
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the path is empty or the format was null and no content format could be deduced from the URL
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the path is null

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public void save(@NonNull
                 android.os.Bundle savedState)
        Saves this playback state into the given bundle. The bundle than be used with create(Bundle) to restore this player state.
        Parameters:
        savedState - the target bundle

        Parameters:

      • create

        @NonNull
public static PlaybackState create(@NonNull
                                            android.os.Bundle bundle)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                            java.lang.NullPointerException
        Takes a Bundle and uses the intent keys from SdkConsts to create a PlaybackState.

        The following keys will be checked:

        • SdkConsts.INTENT_URL expects a String (mandatory)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_START_PLAYING expects a Boolean (default: true)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_POSITION_TO_PLAY expects a Long (default: 0)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_DRM_CONFIGURATION expects a DrmConfiguration (default: null)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_AUDIO_TRACK_GROUP_IDX expects a Integer (default: 0 to play the first track)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_SUBTITLE_TRACK_GROUP_IDX expects a Integer (default: -1 to disable subtitles)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_CONTENT_TYPE expects a Integer (default: SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN to auto-detect). Allowed values are one of SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_DASH, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_HLS, SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_SMOOTHSTREAMING, or SdkConsts.CONTENT_TYPE_MP4
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_AUDIO_VOLUME expects a Float with a value 0 <= value <= 1
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_VIDEO_TRACK_GROUP_IDX expects a Integer (default: 0 to play the first track)
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_PREFERRED_AUDIO_LANGUAGE expects a String and sets the preferred audio language
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_PREFERRED_TEXT_LANGUAGE expects a String and sets the preferred text language
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_DOWNLOAD_FOLDER expects a String and sets the download folder, in case of the offline playback
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_ANALYTICS_SESSION_TYPE expects a int and sets the analytics session type
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_BUFFER_CONFIGURATION expects a BufferConfiguration
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_USER_ID expects a String and sets the User ID
        • SdkConsts.INTENT_LIVE_CONFIGURATION expects a LiveConfiguration
        Parameters:
        bundle - the bundle
        Returns:
        the playback state created from the bundle
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the value type does not match the expected type or the value does is not allowed for a certain parameter
        java.lang.NullPointerException
